name: Elite Helicopter - Gunship Air
description:
Elite Helicopter - Gunship Air 3D is the most enjoyable and realistic 3D helicopters warship battle action games. Strategically fire your powerful machines guns and deadly missiles to destroy enemy’s deployment and convoys across the world. Your gunship helicopter is equipped with heavy machine guns and destructive missiles to demolish enemy’s battleships. It’s an ultimate warship battle and gunship strike between you and enemy convoys.
Features:
High quality air strike scenes to completely immerse you in the game play.
Challenging missions with amazing sound effects.
Multiple weapons like machine gun, missile and many more.
Free and amazing 3d graphics.
Flight simulation combined in air strike gunship battle.
Smooth and realistic driving controls.
